This is a Parent components

example of two way binding
A to kaj se odziva
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { child } from '../model/child'; @Component({ selector: 'app-parent', templateUrl: './parent.component.html', styleUrls: ['./parent.component.css'] }) export class ParentComponent { // child:child[]=[ // {name:"ena", count:1}, // {name:"dva", count:2}, // {name:"tri", count:2} // ] }
